name: Extreme Encounters: Weather and Terrain: Necrotic
name_original: Extreme Encounters: Weather and Terrain: Necrotic
description:
Create Blighted, Cursed, and Unholy Lairs in Minutes! 

Quick, easy templates to spice up encounters, travel, and especially boss fights with demons, devils, druids, necromancers, undead, and warlocks, or staging battles in the lower planes.

In this extreme template pack, you get environment rules as well as new monsters and treasure ideas for:

  • Blighted Wilderness (magical terrain)
  • Cursed Ground (magical terrain)
  • Unholy Ground (magical terrain)
  • Broken Bones (necrotic contamination, curse)
  • Gushing Gore (necrotic contamination, curse)
  • Living Death (necrotic contamination, disease)
  • Soul Rot (necrotic contamination, disease)
  • Zombie Virus (necrotic contamination, disease)

We also give gamemasters (GMs) options to increase the threat level of our magical terrains, including granting hostile creatures in them limited spell lists and/or other terrain-themed abilities! 

 This 5th Edition (5e) handbook is fully compatible with 5e, the 5th Edition of the world's greatest fantasy roleplaying game, but to make full use of it, you also need a copy of the PHB, DMG, and MM.
